homepage.introduction: While we are polishing the last details of the project, we already wanted to give y’all the opportunity to give a clean death to some of your worst mints. Behold: The Funerary Pyre! Now, let’s set things on fire…
homepage.warning: This demo does NOT represent the final experience.
homepage.necrology: Let us observe a moment of contemplation. In memory of those who passed away. They will remain forev’…For real? Get on with it, light that match already!

cta.callToAction: Report a bug or share feedback

prototype.instructions: Don’t blush friend, it’s ok to have trash. Let’s cremate something dead. We’re here to help!
prototype.warning: This demo does NOT represent the final experience.

cta.callToAction: Report a bug or share feedback

item.instructions: Showtime. Cleaning Solana NFT ecosystem one burn at a time. Ready?
item.warning: This demo does NOT represent the final experience.

cta.callToAction: Report a bug or share feedback

children.text: Degenerate Ape Academy is a collection of digital artworks (NFTs) running on the Solana network. This website is only an interface allowing participants to exchange digital collectibles. Users are entirely responsible for the safety and management of their own private Solana wallets and validating all transactions and contracts generated by this website before approval. Furthermore, as the Degenerate Ape Academy smart contract runs on the Solana network, there is no ability to undo, reverse, or restore any transactions.
